About

Hi! I'm self-taught novice front-end developer from Poznań, Poland. I got interested in developing websites about half a year ago and I quickly came to like the power of creation that coding gives you. I especially love the fact that several dozen lines of code can often solve real business problems and help entrepreneurs provide better experience for their customers.
